metadata.title: Friday, 27th February, 2015
metadata.session: FOURTH SESSION OF THE ELEVENTH ASSEMBLY

questions.minister: Minister of Justice when the Government will construct a local court in Chief Chisomo’s area in Muchinga Parliamentary Constituency.
Minister of Transport, Works, Supply and Communication
parts: (a)    why the Mansa-Kashikishi road which was rehabilitated in 2013 is already getting damaged;
(b)    what action the Government has taken against the contractor who worked on the road; and
(c)    what the cost of rehabilitating the road all over again is.

questions.minister: Minister of Transport, Works, Supply and Communication when road signs at cattle crossing points, between Kapyanga Police Check Point and Nateni Bus Station on Mumbwa Road in Nangoma Parliamentary Constituency will be erected.
Minister of Commerce, Trade and Industry what type of industrial clusters the Government plans to establish in Muchinga Parliamentary Constituency.
Minister of Transport, Works, Supply and Communication
parts: (a)    whether Ufulu Road in Lukanga Township in Kabwe District is earmarked for rehabilitation under the Link Zambia 8000 Project; and
(b)    if so, when the works will commence.

questions.minister: Minister of Transport, Works, Supply and Communication
parts: (a)    what has caused the delay in commencing the construction of the road from Kalabo to the Angolan border via Sikongo; and

questions.minister: Minister of Local Government and Housing
parts: (a)    whether the Government has any plans to relocate the Kapiri Mposhi town centre to a more suitable site; and
(b)    if so, when the plans will be implemented.

questions.minister: Minister of Transport, Works, Supply and Communication whether the Government has any plans to erect speed humps at school crossing points on the highways to reduce accidents involving school children.
Minister of Transport, Works, Supply and Communication when the Government will facilitate the construction of communication towers in the following areas of Serenje District
Minister of Local Government and Housing whether the Government has any plans to install street lights on all the newly constructed roads in Kabwe District.
Minister of Transport, Works, Supply and Communication what criterion the Government employs when deciding roads to be rehabilitated in a particular year.

Minister of Education, Science, Vocational Training and Early Education when the Government will construct the following infrastructure at Chandwe Primary School in Nchelenge Parliamentary Constituency
